name: DETERRENCE (itch)
description:
Do you have the nerve to man the control panel of an ICBM launch bunker? Will you be able to wait for commands from your commander, or will you accidentally unleash the apocalypse? Will you avenge any attack without mercy? Find it out with Deterrence, the atomic One-Button-Simulator.

Altough you can play this game in your browser, its recommended to download it for better graphics.

Controls: Use your space bar to first insert the launch keys, the second press launches the missile.
